H0.text: Which is the most northerly of the islands of Japan? Its capital, Sapporo, has hosted the Winter Olympics.. Honshu

H1.text: Which is the most northerly of the islands of Japan? Its capital, Sapporo, has hosted the Winter Olympics.. Hokuriku

H2.text: Which is the most northerly of the islands of Japan? Its capital, Sapporo, has hosted the Winter Olympics.. Kyushu

H3.text: Which is the most northerly of the islands of Japan? Its capital, Sapporo, has hosted the Winter Olympics.. 北海道

A4.text: Hokkaido is the second-largest and northernmost of Japan's four main islands.

A5.text: The largest city on Hokkaido is its own capital, Sapporo.
